name: I Became Gay from Translating My New Roommate's Short Story
storyline: I Became Gay from Translating My New Roommate’s Short Story (or GFT) is a yuri visual novel about two "working" adults in the city of Chicago. There are some adult elements. It is the first major project by the Prof. Lily visual novel collective, who aim to tell stories that face our harsh subcultural reality head-on.
summary:
An anti-work antifiction yuri ADV.

A mediocre translator burned out by capitalism.

A writer who has only been published once in her entire life.

They meet as roommates and develop a relationship that is perhaps much more than love.
